naslov: Kuća za najam/ House for rent: centar Sveta Nedelja (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Kuća se sastoji od četiri spavaće sobe, prostrane kuhinje s blagovaonicom, dvije novouređene kupaonice, dnevnog boravka, terase i zimskog vrta. U dvorištu se nalaze pečenjara, vanjska ostava i vrt. Kuća se nalazi u slijepoj ulici, u izuzetno mirnom okruženju. U blizini su škola, vrtić i trgovine (5 minuta hodom), a Samobor je udaljen manje od 10 minuta vožnje. Zagreb je povezan autocestom, svega 15 minuta vožnje do City Centra One West. U okviru najma na raspolaganju su garaža i parkirna mjesta za 3–4 vozila. Kuća je djelomično opremljena i pogodna za veću obitelj, radnike, dijeljenje (cimerstvo). Cijena najma: 1.850 € + režije *Za radnike ili cimerstvo: Cijena ovisi o načinu korištenja i broju osoba – molimo kontaktirajte za detalje. **Za radnike: sklapa se ugovor isključivo s pravnim osobama (tvrtkama)! Potpisuje se ugovor na minimalno godinu dana, a po primitku ključeva daje se polog u iznosu od 3.000 € te stanarina za tekući mjesec. Za više informacija i razgled, molim vas pošaljite e-mail upit na: najam.kuca170@gmail.com _____________________________________________________________________________________ The house consists of four bedrooms, a spacious kitchen with dining area, two newly renovated bathrooms, a living room, a terrace, and a winter garden. In the yard, there is a barbecue area, an outdoor storage room, and a garden. The house is located in a cul-de-sac, offering an exceptionally quiet environment. There are schools, kindergartens, and shops nearby (5-minute walk), while Samobor is less than a 10-minute drive away. Zagreb is connected by motorway, just 15 minutes by car to City Center One West. The rental includes a garage and parking space for 3–4 vehicles. The house is partially furnished and suitable for a large family, workers, and shared living (flatmates). Rental price: €1,850 + utilities (per month) *For workers or shared living: The price depends on the purpose of use and the number of occupants – please contact us for details. ** For workers: rental agreements are made exclusively with legal entities (companies). A minimum 12-month lease agreement is signed. Upon receiving the keys, a security deposit of €3,000 and the rent for the current month are due. For more information and to schedule a viewing, please send an email inquiry to: najam.kuca170@gmail.com
Troškovi: Agencijska provizija: Najmoprimac ne plaća agencijsku proviziju
